macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: USEGAUGE1
macro.description: YES if gauge 1 is in use, defaults to NO

macro.name: USEGAUGE2
macro.description: YES if gauge 2 is in use, defaults to NO

macro.name: USEGAUGE3
macro.description: YES if gauge 3 is in use, defaults to NO
